viralPosts.text: #disabilityjustice  Our disabled comrades need your helping hands!
viralPosts.author: alsvid.bsky.social

viralPosts.text: Disability justice is economic justice. In 2023, 24.2% of disabled adults 18â€“64 lived in poverty vs 9.9% of nondisabled peers. That gap isnâ€™t grit; itâ€™s policy, access, bias. Enforce ADA, end subminimum wage, raise SSI asset limits, and fund real access. #DisabilityJustice #TruthBombTuesday
viralPosts.author: mrskgrady.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Many seem to think #disabled people "should just work", but they don't understand/care that:

1. Workplaces systemically discriminate against us 

2. We're often paid less than the non-disabled

3. Accommodations that would enable us to work are often denied

and it makes me mad.
#DisabilityJustice
viralPosts.author: ellatholmes.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
They personally don't need them "yet".

They're basically advocating against their older selves' needs.

Slower reaction times, lower vision, arthritis, shorter memory, smaller attention span, you name it.

They'll come around one day and thank us when they can still play.

#a11y #GamesAccessibility
viralPosts.author: tisseranddavid.bsky.social

viralPosts.text: Electronic machines that *also* produce a paper ballot are good, but using paper ballots only would make voting inaccessible to people who are blind/low vision. #CripTheVote

viralPosts.author: mrskgrady.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
I'd love to see more #accessibility in VR Games 

I never bought a VR kit because I can't hold my arms up or stand for long periods of time (>5 mins) 

But, I recently learned about Unseen Diplomacy 2, and it's kind of amazing how much #a11y they've added

blog.triangularpixels.com/development/...
